channel.title: Event Manager[delta]
channel.description:
So I don't really know how to use Graham's event manager properly and I added this in my initialize method
[code=java] EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { public void execute(EventContainer c) { points += 5; sM("You get 5 points"); savegame(true); } }, 60000); // example[/code]
and occasionally I get this in my command promt:
[code=][10/18/11 11:22 AM]: Loaded 5 packets. [10/18/11 11:22 AM]: Loaded 28 custom commands. [10/18/11 11:22 AM]: Loading server, please be patient. [10/18/11 11:22 AM]: Server running on localhost on port 43594 [10/18/11 11:22 AM]: [Client-1-Test]: Character Loaded Sucessfully [Has powers, lag: 63 ms] [10/18/11 11:24 AM]: ClientHandler: Client Test disconnected (activate.adobe.com) [10/18/11 11:24 AM]: [Client-1-Test]: Character Loaded Sucessfully [Has powers, lag: 1 ms] [10/18/11 11:24 AM]: Exception in thread "Thread-0" [10/18/11 11:24 AM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [10/18/11 11:24 AM]: at org.model.Client.sM(Client.java:9503) [10/18/11 11:24 AM]: at org.model.Client$3.execute(Client.java:5567) [10/18/11 11:24 AM]: at org.event.EventContainer.execute(EventContainer.java:50) [10/18/11 11:24 AM]: at org.event.EventManager.run(EventManager.java:99) [10/18/11 11:24 AM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)[/code]
And the event stops working. Any help? Thanks

item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

null means something does not exist, so something on line 9503 in client.java something dosen’t exist that you are calling for.

item.title: Event Manager[delta]
item.dc:creator: @R3minice R3minice
item.description:
@R3minice wrote:

So I don’t really know how to use Graham’s event manager properly and I added this in my initialize method

EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() { public void execute(EventContainer c) { points += 5; sM("You get 5 points"); savegame(true); } }, 60000); // example

and occasionally I get this in my command promt:

[10/18/11 11:22 AM]: Loaded 5 packets. [10/18/11 11:22 AM]: Loaded 28 custom commands. [10/18/11 11:22 AM]: Loading server, please be patient. [10/18/11 11:22 AM]: Server running on localhost on port 43594 [10/18/11 11:22 AM]: [Client-1-Test]: Character Loaded Sucessfully [Has powers, lag: 63 ms] [10/18/11 11:24 AM]: ClientHandler: Client Test disconnected (activate.adobe.com) [10/18/11 11:24 AM]: [Client-1-Test]: Character Loaded Sucessfully [Has powers, lag: 1 ms] [10/18/11 11:24 AM]: Exception in thread "Thread-0" [10/18/11 11:24 AM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [10/18/11 11:24 AM]: at org.model.Client.sM(Client.java:9503) [10/18/11 11:24 AM]: at org.model.Client$3.execute(Client.java:5567) [10/18/11 11:24 AM]: at org.event.EventContainer.execute(EventContainer.java:50) [10/18/11 11:24 AM]: at org.event.EventManager.run(EventManager.java:99) [10/18/11 11:24 AM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)

And the event stops working. Any help?
Thanks
